text: The Windward Islands are the southern islands of the Lesser Antilles in the West Indies. They are south of the Leeward Islands. The Antillean Windward Islands from north to south are: *Dominica *Martinique (an overseas department of France) *Saint Lucia *Saint Vincent *Grenadines *Grenada Barbados and Trinidad and Tobago are not part of the Windward Islands. Category:Caribbean islands
title: Windward Islands
